About.title: Keven Goulart
About.subtitle: Full-Stack Developer
About.presentation: Hello! I am looking for an opportunity to grow as a professional. I work as a developer specialized in TypeScript, Node.js, React, Next.js, and Nest.js among other technologies.
About.experience: I have experience in developing complete applications, working on both the front-end and back-end, focusing on scalable and well-structured solutions.
